description:
Redesign forms for mobile with single-column layouts, smart field ordering, and collapsible sections for related inputs. Implement floating labels and inline validation that doesn't require scrolling to see.

**Rationale:** Forms are notoriously difficult on mobile due to limited screen space and keyboard interactions. Optimized layouts reduce cognitive load, minimize scrolling, and improve completion rates significantly.
title: Create mobile-optimized form layouts with field grouping
